entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
